Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special introductory price of $8500. I believe this is an exceptional deal considering its market value and the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $8,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $8,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
